hours_text:
OPEN TO THE PUBLIC | ADMISSION ALWAYS FREE

From Permanent Collection installations to special exhibitions, there’s always something new at the Bowdoin College Museum of Art. We look forward to seeing you!

[ FAQs for Visitors ](faq.html) [ visit from home ](at-home.html) [ Exhibitions on view ](../exhibitions/index.html)

### **Museum Hours**

**Tuesday–Saturday**  
10:00 a.m.–5:00 p.m.  
**Thursday**  
10:00 a.m.–8:30 p.m.  
**Sunday**  
1:00 p.m.–5:00 p.m.

Closed Mondays and national holidays

The Museum will be closed starting **Monday, December 22, 2025** **through** **Monday, January 12, 2026** in observance of the holidays and to help facilitate rotations and renovations. We look forward to welcoming visitors back to the Museum on Tuesday, January 13, 2026.

### Physical Address (for GPS)

245 Maine Street, Brunswick, ME 04011  
(please do not send mail to this address)

### Mailing Address

Bowdoin College Museum of Art  
9400 College Station, Brunswick, ME 04011

### Maps and Information

[Google Map](https://www.google.com/maps?cid=9542893197325339469&q=Bowdoin+College+Museum+of+Art,+Brunswick,+ME&hl=en&ved=0CBQQ-gswAA&sa=X&ei=Yt1PT5GtFsSx8gbx7uH2CQ&sig2=774JMt0zprhEaBMjmHqcEA)  
[Traveling to Bowdoin](https://www.bowdoin.edu/about/campus-location/directions/index.html)  
[Parking at Bowdoin](https://www.bowdoin.edu/about/campus-location/parking/index.html)  
[Campus Maps](https://www.bowdoin.edu/about/campus-location/maps/index.html)

admission_text:
## and also stressful. And hopeful, and overwhelming, and _worth it_.

Our job in the Office of Admissions is to help make this time more humane, for you and your family,  _wherever you are in the process. _Have questions?__**[We can help!](https://admissions.bowdoin.edu/register/contact#Get%20in%20touch%20with%20your%20questions "Questions?")**

Take this time to really explore what Bowdoin has to offer: browse our **[majors and minors](../academics/departments-and-programs/index.html)** , learn about **[our location](https://www.bowdoin.edu/about/campus-location/index.html)** , and get a feel for where you might **[live, eat, and play](https://www.bowdoin.edu/campus-life/index.html)**.

The people you meet here will be your friends, **[your network](https://www.bowdoin.edu/academics/after-bowdoin/index.html)** , and your community, for life—so find out **[what makes Bowdoin different](https://www.bowdoin.edu/about/index.html)** , and ask yourself if this place feels like a good fit.

### Quickly Find:

[Request More Info](https://www.bowdoin.edu/admissions/request-info/index.html) [Visit](https://www.bowdoin.edu/admissions/visit/index.html) [Virtual Events](https://www.bowdoin.edu/admissions/connect/index.html)

## and also stressful. And hopeful, and overwhelming, and _worth it_.

Our job in the Office of Admissions is to help make this time more humane, for you and your family,  _wherever you are in the process. _Have questions?__**[We can help!](https://admissions.bowdoi...
accessibility_text:
Bowdoin is committed to making **_all of its resources_ **available to each one of its community members. 

We can help students, faculty, and staff identify and eliminate barriers—including disabilities, impairments, health conditions, or other access needs—so everyone has a chance to **succeed in their classes, research, and work,** and to **enjoy their time** here.
collections_text:
### Announcement

**Renovation Notice**

The Museum's level two galleries are temporarily closed to facilitate renovations and exhibition rotations. Please check [exhibition pages](https://www.bowdoin.edu/art-museum/exhibitions/index.html) for more information on specific exhibitions. Thank you for your patience and we look forward to welcoming you back to these galleries soon!

**Renovation Notice**

The Museum's level two galleries are temporarily closed to facilitate renovations and exhibition rotations. Please check [exhibition pages](https://www.bowdoin.edu/art-museum/exhibitions/index.html) for more information on specific exhibitions. Thank you for your patience and we look forward to welcoming you back to these galleries soon!
